judgedsentence.src: Herr Präsident, verehrte Kolleginnen und Kollegen! Im Namen des Ausschusses für Wirtschaft und Währung lege ich heute dem Plenum den Entschließungsantrag zu dem Bericht der Kommission über das einheitliche System des mittelfristigen finanziellen Beistands zur Stützung der Zahlungsbilanzen der Mitgliedstaaten vor.
judgedsentence.tgt: Mr President, ladies and gentlemen, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, I would suggest to the House today the motion for a resolution on the Commission report on the single system of medium-term financial assistance for Member States' balances of payments.

Mr. Praesident, admired colleagues and colleagues! In the name of the committee for economics and currency I submit today the resolution request to the plenum to the report of the commission over the uniform system of the medium-term financial assistance for the supporting of the balances of payments of the member states.

judgedsentence.src: Deshalb bin ich froh und möchte an dieser Stelle auch den Kolleginnen und Kollegen des Haushaltsausschusses dafür danken und vor allem der Generalberichterstatterin, dass wir letztlich gemeinsam einen Weg gefunden haben, die Schieflage des Haushaltsentwurfs zugunsten der eindeutigen Prioritäten dieses Hauses zu korrigieren, zugunsten von mehr Beschäftigung und sozialem Zusammenhalt, auch wenn wir natürlich als Ausschuss für Beschäftigung und soziale Angelegenheiten noch Wünsche offen haben.
judgedsentence.tgt: Therefore, I am glad and would like to thank at this point also to the colleagues and colleagues of the budget committee for it and above all of the general reporter that we have found, in the end, together a way to correct the skew position of the budgetary draft in favour of the unequivocal priorities of this house in favour of from more employment and social cohesion, even if we still have wishes of course as a committee for employment and social affairs openly.

I am therefore pleased and would like to take this opportunity to thank my colleagues in the Committee on Budgets and, above all, to thank the general rapporteur, that, in the end, we have found a way together, the imbalance of the draft budget for the benefit of the clear priorities in this House, to correct in favour of increased employment and social cohesion, if we also, of course, the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs have still to be desired.

judgedsentence.src: Mit der GAP wurde von jeher die Ertragsintensivierung, die schrittweise "Vertikalisierung " der Produktion und die Konzentration der Ländereien gefördert, was vor allem den Interessen der Agrarindustrie und der großen transnationalen Lebensmittelhersteller diente.
judgedsentence.tgt: With the CAP the yield intensification, the gradual "Vertikalisierung" of the production and the concentration of the estates was promoted always, what primarily served the interests of the agribusiness and the big transnational food manufacturers.

With the GAP, the yield intensification, that promoted gradually "Vertikalisierung" of the production and the concentration of the country eggs, became of time immemorial, what served above all the interests of the agroindustry and the large train oil national groceries manufacturers.

judgedsentence.src: Die Konzentration auf rein reaktives Krisenmanagement hat die Gemeinsame Außen- und Sicherheitspolitik in eine totale Schieflage gebracht.

judgedsentence.tgt: As far as the general extension of qualified majority voting is concerned, which I believe to be a helpful suggestion, because that would be deprived of the right of Member States, at the appropriate time to decide whether a policy should be a Community policy.

judgedsentence.src: Der erste Punkt der Einigung zwischen Rat und Parlament betrifft die außenpolitischen Maßnahmen, d. h. die Rubrik IV des Haushalts, bei denen unsere Institutionen das gemeinsame Ziel verfolgten, unter Berücksichtigung der jüngsten Entwicklung der politischen Lage in Serbien im Jahr 2001 substanzielle Mittel für den Balkan bereitzustellen, ohne dadurch jedoch die übrigen geographischen Prioritäten des außenpolitischen Wirkens der Union zu beeinträchtigen.
judgedsentence.tgt: The first point of the agreement between the Council and Parliament is the external actions, that is to say the heading 4 of the budget, on which our institutions, the common objective pursued in the light of the recent development of the political situation in Serbia for the year 2001 substantial funds available for the Balkans, but without the other geographical priorities of the external action of the Union.

The first point of the unification between advice and parliament concerns the international measures, i.e. the category IV of the household, with which our institutions pursued the joint goal, of allocating under consideration of the youngest development of the political situation in Serbia into 2001 substantial means for the Balkan Peninsula, without through it however the remaining geographic priorities of the international causing of the union impairing.

judgedsentence.src: Im Bericht heißt es unter Buchstabe JJ, "in der Erwägung, dass Russland sich in einer politischen Union mit Weißrussland befindet und es daher für die demokratische Legitimität Russlands wichtig ist, dass Präsident Putin und die russische Regierung deutlich und beharrlich auf den großen Bedarf an demokratischen Fortschritten und Reformen in Weißrussland hinweisen, nicht zuletzt im Lichte des Berichts, den die parlamentarische Troika der EU, des Europarates und der Organisation für Sicherheit und Zusammenarbeit in Europa (OSZE) am 16. Oktober 2000 in Minsk vorgelegt hat ".
judgedsentence.tgt: In the report it is stated in point, jj 'in the recital that Russia is in a political union with Belarus, and it is therefore important for the democratic legitimacy of Russia, President Putin and the Russian Government clearly and single-mindedly on the great need for democratic progress and reform in Belarus, not least in the light of the report that the parliamentary troika of the EU, the Council of Europe and the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE) on 16 October 2000 in Minsk has presented.

In the report it is called under letter JJ, "in the consideration the fact that Russia is in a political union with white Russia and is important it therefore for the democratic legitimacy of Russia that president Putin and the Russian government refer clearly and persistently to the large need at democratic progress and reforms in white Russia, not least in the light of the report, that the parliamentary troika of the European Union, the Council of Europe and on 16 October 2000 in Minsk submitted to the organization for security and co-operation in Europe (Organization for Security and Cooperation in Euro)".

judgedsentence.src: Als Hauptaussage des Buches bezeichnete er die These, dass das Klima sich ständig ändere und dass seine Veränderungen also normal seien, dass es zur Erderwärmung keine übereinstimmende Meinung unter den Wissenschaftlern gebe, dass die Folgen der gegenwärtigen Veränderungen nicht allzu groß und ernst seien und somit keine Bedrohung darstellten, und dass die Bemühungen, die Entwicklung des Klimas zu beeinflussen, überflüssig, wirkungslos und inakzeptabel aufwändig seien.
judgedsentence.tgt: The main thrust of the book he described the thesis that the climate is constantly changing and that its changes are therefore quite natural that it to global warming, is no consensus among scientists that the consequences of the current changes are not too large and serious and therefore no threat, and that the efforts to influence the development of the climate, superfluous, ineffective and expensive.
